title: Is the Pixel 4a sold in India "unlocked"?
content:
I have seen a tweet of a user stating that his pixel 4a does not work in the UAE after he had purchased it from India. He mentions that it is because of a "country lock". I have been trying to reach flipkart India for a long time and no one gives a damn to even reply.

I just want to know whether the Pixel 4a being sold in India is fully "unlocked" as I will be using it abroad.

https://twitter.com/omermuktha/status/1333789885535195138
